announcement.p: PHP Development Team is would like to announce the immediate release of PHP 4.3.11. This is a maintenance release that in addition to over 70 non-critical bug fixes addresses several security issues inside the exif and fbsql extensions as well as the unserialize(), swf_definepoly() and getimagesize() functions.
All Users of PHP are strongly encouraged to upgrade to this release.

ul.li: Crash in bzopen() if supplied path to non-existent file.
DOM crashing when attribute appended to Document.
unserialize() float problem on non-English locales.
Crash in msg_send() when non-string is stored without being serialized.
Fixed crash in chunk_split(), when chunklen > strlen.
session_set_save_handler crashes PHP when supplied non-existent object ref.
Fixed crash in overloaded objects & overload() function.

announcement.p: For a full list of changes in PHP 4.3.11, see the ChangeLog.
